name: Magical Paws
storyline: Hikari is shy and lacks self-esteem. One day, she gets assigned the worst kind of job for her: being the organizer of the camping trip. But she finds 3 magical cards that grant wishes. Will she be able to overcome her fears and open to others? Who are the beings inside these cards? Maybe with them, she can find out something a bit more than friendship...
